names.name: El
names.description: The Divine Name associated with Chesed, emphasizing the aspect of God as the source of benevolence and kindness.

names.name: Tzadkiel
names.description: The Archangel known as the Righteousness of God, embodying the mercy and grace of the divine.

names.name: Chasmalim
names.description: The order of angels associated with Chesed, representing the emanation of divine love and the vision of love.

names.name: Jupiter
names.description: The planetary influence associated with Chesed, symbolizing expansion, benevolence, and prosperity.

names.name: Tzadekh
names.description: Reflects the attribute of justice tempered with mercy, the balance of fairness and compassion.

names.name: Obedience
names.description: Signifies the discipline to follow the divine will and the path of righteousness.

names.name: Ruach
names.description: Represents the aspect of the soul related to intellect and memory, connecting the emotions with reason.
